SELECT COUNT(STORENO) FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0 AND STORECATEGRY = #{storyCategory}

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0 AND STORECATEGORY = #{storyCategory} ORDER BY STORENO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT DISTINCT STORENAME FROM STOREREG WHERE ${column} LIKE #{query} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(STORENO) FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0 AND ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
